descript.abstract: Contains data from CARTO.CTYLIMIT.Updated as needed.
descript.purpose: City of Seattle municipal boundaries. Includes northerly and southerly boundaries for the city. The easterly and westerly boundaries of the city are defined by waterbodies.

idinfo.useconst: The City of Seattle makes no representation or warranty as to its accuracy, and in particular, its accuracy as to labeling, dimensions, contours, property boundaries, or placement or location or any map feature thereof.

metainfo.metstdn: FGDC Content Standard for Digital Geospatial Metadata
